item.title: Reno Ghosts Tour
item.description: Spend a thrilling hour hearing all about the city’s most famous ghost stories and seeing the sights of Reno at the same time. From the Washoe County Courthouse to the Levy Mansion, there will be plenty of dark tales to give you goosebumps, courtesy of a passionate local tour guide.

image.alt: Reno Ghosts Tour

item.title: Experience Raptors and Falconry in Reno
item.description:
A GROUP of attendees are given the opportunity for a unique experience into the life of a Raptor with an up close and personal encounter with Hawks, Falcons and Owls.
With the assistance of a licensed Falconer, you will learn the biology, conservation, field identification, traits, behaviors, natural history, and the importance of raptors.
Following a brief instruction guests will be fitted with a gauntlet and join a trained Hawk on a short walk – witness the agility and skill as she flies from perch to perch while swooping back to the Falconer’s gauntlet.

image.alt: Experience Raptors and Falconry in Reno

item.title: 1 Hour Distillery Tour and Tasting Flight
item.description: Immerse yourself in flavored spirits with this 1-hour distillery tour and tasting flight at Ferino Distillery. Enjoy an intimate tour of the facilities and learn about the family’s history and its connection to the origins of flavored spirits in Italy, then savor a tasting flight that includes spirits such as a cinnamon cordial, fernet, and coffee liqueur.

image.alt: 1 Hour Distillery Tour and Tasting Flight

item.title: Downtown Reno Tour
item.description: Sit back and relax while your pedicab tour leader takes you around downtown Reno and tells you all about the city. Great for anyone looking to get their bearings in town for the first time, this experience takes you around essential sights like the Truckee River and the iconic Reno arches.

image.alt: Downtown Reno Tour

item.title: From Reno Arch to Truckee River: A Self-Guided Audio Tour
item.description: Discover the “Biggest Little City in the World” as you explore the downtown area of Reno with an audio guide. Embark on a self-guided audio tour of the city and learn about the history of the desert town. From cowboys to gambling to celebrities, you are sure to be fascinated by all of the events that have occurred in this little city.

image.alt: From Reno Arch to Truckee River: A Self-Guided Audio Tour

item.title: Historic Donner Party, Immigrant Trail and Lake Tahoe Photo Tour from Reno
item.description: This Emigrant Trail and Lake Tahoe Donner Party Private Tour is a perfect choice for history buffs as it dives deeply into California Gold Rush history. Without the hassle of learning the history with a large tour group, you’ll explore with just your own group and private guide. Hear stories of the Oregon Trail route, including Emigrant Trail and Lake Tahoe, as well as stories of the first transcontinental railroad and Reno’s origin.

image.alt: Historic Donner Party, Immigrant Trail and Lake Tahoe Photo Tour from Reno

item.title: MidTown Mural Pedicab Tour
item.description: Explore the many murals in Reno’s vibrant Midtown District with ease with this private 1-hour pedicab tour. Let your guide take you around the main streets and hidden alleys of Midtown, and discover more than 30 murals. Includes the option to stop for boba tea and tacos along the way.

image.alt: MidTown Mural Pedicab Tour

item.title: Brewery Tour
item.description: Discover Reno’s thriving craft beer scene—and enjoy a one-of-a-kind way to explore the city—on this private pedicab tour. Pick from multiple convenient departure times, meet your guide in central Reno, and hop aboard. You’ll visit three of the city’s up-and-coming craft breweries, with generous samples and guided tours at each. Between visits, spot Reno murals and immerse yourself in the city’s laidback vibe.

image.alt: Brewery Tour

item.title: Truckee River Rafting or Kayaking Tours from Reno
item.description: Outdoor activities are in abundance in northwest Nevada, but this rafting tour on the Truckee River in Reno is a great choice for any type of adventurous traveler, whether traveling alone or in a group. You’ll catch a glimpse of the Sierras as you go down the river, and snacks are included for added convenience. Plus, you can upgrade with options that include a horseback ride, as well as other picks.

image.alt: Truckee River Rafting or Kayaking Tours from Reno

item.title: Horseback Riding Adventure from Reno
item.description: When visiting Reno, experience the dramatic landscape of Nevada on a horseback ride that traces the trails of the Wild West. Your guide provides you with a horse that matches your riding ability, then leads you on a ride with views of high desert plateaus and the the snow-capped peaks of the Sierra Nevada Range. Your tour includes snacks and round-trip transportation from Reno.

image.alt: Horseback Riding Adventure from Reno

item.title: ATV and Trap Excursion from Reno
item.description: Take a break from the glitz and noise of Reno and make the most of the stunning Sierra Nevada vistas with this unique outdoor experience. Drive an ATV around the picturesque valleys, forests and alpine deserts of the Sierra Nevada Mountains and try your hand at trap shooting at a specially-designed clay pigeon shooting platform right in the heart of the Sierras. With a guide on hand to coach you and lead you through your activities, this experience is great for shooters and off-road drivers of all experience levels.

image.alt: ATV and Trap Excursion from Reno

item.title: Reno City Scavenger Hunt Excursion by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: While walking tours are helpful for getting oriented, they rely on guides and don’t encourage off-script exploration. With this interactive scavenger hunt, explore at your own pace while scouring Reno for items needed to survive the zombie apocalypse, taking on zombie-themed challenges along the way. Communicate with a game host via chat during the hunt, and compare your scores with other teams across the country when you’ve completed it.

image.alt: Reno City Scavenger Hunt Excursion by Zombie Scavengers

item.title: Burning Man Art and Downtown Mural Private Tour
item.description: Get more out of limited time in Reno by setting off on this art–themed private tour to discover installations that appeared at Burning Man as well as some of the city’s most eye-catching murals. To save you the hassle of organizing transport, private pickup is included, so you can get to the Reno Strip quickly, without having to figure out logistics.

image.alt: Burning Man Art and Downtown Mural Private Tour

item.title: Snowmobiling Packages in the Sierra's from Reno, Nevada
item.description: Experience the thrill of zipping through the snow in the high Sierras on this half-day excursion from Reno. Head to the mountains with a small group and discover trails with scenic views and beautiful forests. Your guide takes you to the areas with the best conditions for an enjoyable ride in the Sierras.

image.alt: Snowmobiling Packages in the Sierra's from Reno, Nevada

item.title: Lake Tahoe Audio Driving Tour
item.description:
Discover the unparalleled beauty of Lake Tahoe with Shaka Guide's audio tour. Immerse yourself in stunning views and rich history as you explore both the California and Nevada sides of the lake. Let the knowledgeable narrator be your guide, providing fascinating insights and highlighting the best spots.
From Vikingsholm Castle to Emerald Bay, you'll uncover hidden gems and iconic landmarks. Enjoy the flexibility to explore at your own pace, with the freedom to pause or skip ahead. Experience the magic of Lake Tahoe with Shaka Guide, creating unforgettable memories along the way.
*Download the Shaka Guide app to access your purchased tours.*

image.alt: Lake Tahoe Audio Driving Tour

item.title: 45 Minutes Twinkle Tours in Reno
item.description:
What Are Twinkle Tours? Embark on a whimsical adventure with Travel Pineapple. Perfect for a romantic date night, a delightful family outing or a unique addition to your business or personal holiday party. Tours are 45 minutes of traveling through the Let It Glow Lights in MidTown.
Tours on Pineapple Pedicabs:
Ideal for small groups of 2-4 people. Get festive with our pedicabs turned into little sleighs, complete with fur seats and blankets to keep you warm!
Tours run every Thursday and Friday, starting at 5, 6 & 7 pm.

image.alt: 45 Minutes Twinkle Tours in Reno

item.title: UTV OR Snow Mobile & Snowshoe Winter Adventures from Reno
item.description: Embark on an unforgettable winter adventure through the stunning Sierra backcountry on a state-of-the-art all-terrain quad. This exhilarating tour lets you experience the crisp winter air and breathtaking views of snow-capped mountains. Ride alongside a professional guide who will lead you through scenic trails, showcasing the pristine winter landscapes of the Sierra Nevada. Enjoy convenient hotel pickup from Reno, snacks, and an adventure to remember.

image.alt: UTV OR Snow Mobile & Snowshoe Winter Adventures from Reno

item.title: Private Day Trip from Reno To Historic Old West Virginia City
item.description: Immerse yourself in the Old West on a captivating day trip from Reno to Virginia City. Wander through the historic streets where the scent of old-time saloons mingles with the aroma of freshly baked bread from local eateries. Hear the echoes of the gold rush era as you explore preserved buildings and charming shops. Taste the flavors of the past in classic Western fare while soaking in panoramic views of Nevada’s high desert. This adventure offers a vibrant mix of history and culture, with stories of legendary figures and a glimpse into a bygone era, ensuring a rich and unforgettable experience.

image.alt: Private Day Trip from Reno To Historic Old West Virginia City

item.title: Reno/Tahoe Airplane Flight
item.description:
NV Flight is locally owned and operated. We are certified as a Part 91 Air Tour operator and will provide you local, professional commercial pilots and commercial flight instructors who will guide your in flight experience!
Take all the photos you like! We will be flying you over the spectacular Lake Tahoe, Truckee, and Reno area. The views are incredible!
Keep in mind, Nevada has beautiful sunsets! Let us know if you would like to request a prime time for a sunset tour!

image.alt: Reno/Tahoe Airplane Flight

item.title: Carson City Crusade Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

image.alt: Carson City Crusade Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Reno Puzzling Adventure
item.description: With this self-guided Reno scavenger hunt tour, exploring the city’s gems becomes a game. Solve puzzles and decode brain teasers that lead you to top sights around the city. Because the entire activity is on your smartphone, you can start and stop on your own schedule along with up a group of up to 12 of your friends, family members, or co-workers.

image.alt: Reno Puzzling Adventure

item.title: ATV - Tours & Trap Shooting Combo Packages from Reno
item.description: Get off-road in the Sierra Nevada Mountains outside of Reno on this all-terrain vehicle tour. You'll get far off the beaten path, where most standard tours don't visit, with the benefit of these rugged vehicles. See the verdant valleys and meadows, the pine forests, the high desert, and the pristine bodies of water, stopping to listen to commentary on the area. There are several ATV options to fit your skill level and group size.

image.alt: ATV - Tours & Trap Shooting Combo Packages from Reno

item.title: Self-Guided Reno Scavenger Hunt: Reno Adventure
item.description: Discover the best of Reno, from top landmarks to hidden gems, on this fun and interactive scavenger hunt. Download the app, gather your group and head out to uncover clues, answer trivia questions and solve challenges, all while learning about the history and culture of the city. You’ll work as a team but compete against each other to see who will be the winner.

image.alt: Self-Guided Reno Scavenger Hunt: Reno Adventure

item.title: Reno Tahoe Airport to Heavenly Mountain - Round-Trip Transfer
item.description:
Book your private transfer from Reno Tahoe International Airport (RNO) to Heavenly Mountain Ski Resort and return.
Don't go through all the hassle of waiting in a long taxi or shared shuttles queues and use our private, door to door airport transfer.
Your driver will be waiting for you at a scheduled time and you will travel comfortably to your destination.
• Meeting with a Nameplate • We track your Flight • Door-to-door Service • No Hidden Charges • Clean cars & Professional drivers

image.alt: Reno Tahoe Airport to Heavenly Mountain - Round-Trip Transfer
